title: How to search For Aussie bus information

posts.content:
How do you find build information for an Australian built bus?
I am looking specifically for a 63 bus..
I believe that buses built in Australia did not have m code plates and were not required by Australian build rules?
So how and where do you find build details?
I understand from this thread they are not marked as built by VW?
So guys how and where do you enquire to find the build options, model info, colour etc.?

https://forums.kombiclub.com/threads/m- ... ombi.3759/
G

I remembered a post with Aussie paint codes and a chart and found it on thesamba.com

https://www.thesamba.com/vw/archives/li ... tralia.php

You should read this, if you have a compliance plate behind the front seat then John (IN2VWS) is the man of knowledge here in Aust.
https://www.ssvc.org.uk/phpbb/viewtopic ... WS#p595577
Cheers.. is for 8 bus whose mate Stu has just bought an Aussie 15w deluxe
